title: Trakt Multi-Scrobbler
subtitle: Send Jellyfin watches to one or more Trakt users.
panel.traktHelper: Toggle which Trakt users will receive new Jellyfin watches.
history.helper: Pick which Jellyfin user's plays you want to mirror.
label.traktNotConfigured: Trakt is not configured. Set TRAKT_CLIENT_ID/SECRET and add accounts to trakt_accounts.json.
label.noTraktAccounts: No Trakt accounts have been added yet.
modal.deviceStep: 1) Open the link, 2) enter the code, 3) approve access.
modal.approved: Approved for user {user}. Adding to list‚Ä¶
modal.startError: Cannot start device flow. Check Trakt client id/secret.
